Name: The CLASSLA-Stanza model for lemmatisation of non-standard Croatian 2.1
Description: The model for lemmatisation of non-standard Croatian was built with the CLASSLA-Stanza tool by training on the hr500k training corpus and the ReLDI-NormTagNER-hr corpus, using the hrLex inflectional lexicon. These corpora were additionally augmented for handling missing diacritics by repeating parts of the corpora with diacritics removed. The estimated F1 of the lemma annotations is ~94.23. The model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.
